summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of TalkNow platform. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with seamless authentication, chat functionality, premium features, admin dashboard, and settings management. AI moderation integration with GPT-5.2 working correctly.
passed_tests: All 17 backend API endpoints (auth, chat queue, payments, admin, moderation)
Chat room interface and mode selection
Admin dashboard with real-time stats and moderation logs
Settings page with preferences and interests management
